name: USortit
short_description:
Sorting Your Media and Document-Files can be very annoying - USortit helps making this task easy and quick.
You just have to define a couple of target-folders each with a headword and index terms and a source-folder.
Then USortit will walk through the source-files, showing You the actual Media or Document-File in a Preview-Window and with a single Click USortit moves (or copies) the File to the chosen Target-Folder and advances to the next Source-File. If possible the Media-File will get tagged with the chosen index terms.
Thus Sorting Your Files will become an easy and quick job.
summary: Sorting Your Media and Document-Files easily - Just One Click needed
